bug.short_desc: Drag and drop scales window content

long_desc.thetext:
Happens on iPad (iOS 9): If you open the "Drag & Drop" demo of the Demo Showcase and drag an element of the Shop column to the bottom left of the screen, the complete page is scaled down.
Expected behaviour: keep everything like it is and don't allow dragging out of borders.
Cajus, thanks for the report. Currently unable to confirm on a iOS9 device, would you be able to further analyze and possibly come up with a pull request?

See here for a short video of the issue:
https://ferdi.naasa.net/oc/index.php/s/rkerjnX1putrWO8

Thanks for the video! Would you mind trying out the following meta tag in your local index.html of the Showcase?
<meta name="viewport" content="initial-scale=1.0001, minimum-scale=1.0001, maximum-scale=1.0001, user-scalable=no"/>
Might be related to a current issue of iOS 9, https://forums.developer.apple.com/thread/13510

Great. Well, sort of.
As it seems to be an issue of iOS9 itself, we're gonna close this bug report (without a reminder). Supposedly, with one of the next updates to iOS9 it might get fixed by Apple anyway, so keep your eyes open. Thanks again, always a pleasure working with you.
